description: Brookfield Renewable Partners L.P. owns a portfolio of renewable power generating facilities primarily in North America, Colombia, Brazil, Europe, India, and China. The company generates electricity through hydroelectric, wind, solar, distributed generation, pumped storage, cogeneration, and biomass sources. Its portfolio consists of approximately 21,000 megawatts of installed capacity. Brookfield Renewable Partners Limited operates as the general partner of Brookfield Renewable Partners L.P. The company was formerly known as Brookfield Renewable Energy Partners L.P. and changed its name to Brookfield Renewable Partners L.P. in May 2016. Brookfield Renewable Partners L.P. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda.
description_en: Brookfield Renewable Partners L.P. owns a portfolio of renewable power generating facilities primarily in North America, Colombia, Brazil, Europe, India, and China. The company generates electricity through hydroelectric, wind, solar, distributed generation, pumped storage, cogeneration, and biomass sources. Its portfolio consists of approximately 21,000 megawatts of installed capacity. Brookfield Renewable Partners Limited operates as the general partner of Brookfield Renewable Partners L.P. The company was formerly known as Brookfield Renewable Energy Partners L.P. and changed its name to Brookfield Renewable Partners L.P. in May 2016. Brookfield Renewable Partners L.P. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda.
description_uk: Brookfield Renewable Partners L.P. володіє портфелем потужностей з відновлюваної енергетики переважно в Північній Америці, Колумбії, Бразилії, Європі, Індії та Китаї. Компанія виробляє електроенергію за допомогою гідроелектростанцій, вітру, сонця, розподіленої генерації, гідроакумулювання, когенерації та джерел біомаси. Його портфель складається з приблизно 21 000 мегават встановленої потужності. Brookfield Renewable Partners Limited діє як генеральний партнер Brookfield Renewable Partners L.P. Раніше компанія була відома як Brookfield Renewable Energy Partners L.P., а в травні 2016 року змінила назву на Brookfield Renewable Partners L.P. Brookfield Renewable Partners L.P. була заснована в 1999 році, її штаб-квартира розташована в м. Гамільтон, Бермудські острови.
